patterns.from: When I go to the "(.*?)" page
And I fill in the "(.*?)" with "(.*?)"
And I click on the "(.*?)" button
patterns.to: When the user submits the "$1" action

patterns.from: Then I should see a confirmation message "(.*?)"
patterns.to: Then a confirmation message "$1" should be displayed

patterns.from: Then I should see an error message "(.*?)"
patterns.to: Then an error message "$1" should be displayed
